title: Johnny Damon Foundation
content:
Hi everyone.

I’m kicking myself right now. I feel really stupid not knowing this one. It seems too obvious. Any help?

[http://logopond.com/logos/johnny\_damon\_found.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121130443/http:/logopond.com/logos/johnny_damon_found.jpg "http://logopond.com/logos/johnny\_damon\_found.jpg")

Best.

 [‹ celtic font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121130443/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43203 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Last Temptation of Christ movie credits ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121130443/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43209 "Go to next forum topic")
author: loavesandfishes

comments.content: This is Agenda (mostly the bold weight) from Font Bureau. “JOHNNY” has been stretched horizontally a bit.
